scripts.build: npm run clean && npx cpx2 "../shared/src/**/*.{js,ts}" dist/lib && npx cpx2 "*.{html,css,js,json}" dist && npx cpx2 "icons/**/*" dist/icons && npx cpx2 "../assets/logo/logo-vector.svg" dist/icons && npx cpx2 "sounds/**/*" dist/sounds && npx cpx2 "fonts/**/*" dist/fonts && npx cpx2 "../assets/flags/**/*" dist/flags
